snippet: While Congress debates cuts to the federal food stamp program, it has been reluctant to make changes to the crop insurance program, despite several recent fraud cases.
abstract: Congress is debating cuts in federal food stamp program, which lawmakers say is rife with fraud and waste, as part of its work on comprehensive farm bill, but it has been reluctant to make changes in crop insurance program despite several fraud cases.
lead_paragraph: While Congress debates cuts to the federal food stamp program, it has been reluctant to make changes to the crop insurance program, despite several recent fraud cases.

headline.main: Fraud Used to Frame Farm Bill Debate
headline.print_headline: Fraud Used To Frame Farm Bill Debate
